create1: Here you can create any tournament from scratch with ease:
create2: Give it a name: Customize the name of your tournament to reflect its spirit.
create3: Add a category: Classify your tournament according to the sport, game, or activity.
create4: Define the number of participants: Decide how many players or teams can participate.
create5: Set a start date: Choose the start day of the tournament.
create6: Add a description: Write a detailed description to provide all necessary information.
create7: Set privacy: Choose whether the tournament will be private or public.
create8: *These exclusive features are available only for Premium users.
join1: Here you can join any tournament with ease:
join2: Search for a tournament: Use our powerful search engine to find the tournament that interests you the most.
join3: Review the details: Check the detailed information of the tournament, including the category, number of participants, and start date.
join4: Immediate public registration: Join public tournaments directly without approval.
join5: Private registration: Join private tournaments directly using the password provided by the creator.
join6: *These features are available for all users.
view1: Here you can view all available tournaments with ease:
view2: Filter by preferences: Use our advanced filters to find the tournaments that best match your interests.
view3: Check the details: Get complete information about each tournament, the description, and the participants.
view4: Explore the tournament list: Browse through our wide selection of tournaments.
view5: *These features are available for all users.
aboutUs_paragraph1: Welcome to our company! We are dedicated to providing a robust and adaptable web platform with advanced functionalities. Our goal is to offer a complete and immersive experience across all devices, from PCs to mobile phones.
aboutUs_paragraph2: We believe in the power of innovation and strive to provide modern solutions that meet the current needs of users. Our platform allows users to participate in tournaments, manage and organize competitions, and stay connected with the latest events and updates.
aboutUs_paragraph3: Thank you for choosing us. We look forward to serving you and helping you achieve your goals through an exceptional user experience and high-quality services.
changePassword_rules: Password 6 characters max. One uppercase & one lowercase letter, and one number.
join_notLoggedIn: You need to be logged in to join a tournament.

prime_description: Unlock exclusive features by becoming a prime user.
prime_why_description: As a prime user, you get access to premium features that enhance your tournament experience. Create and manage your own tournaments, gain priority support, and enjoy an ad-free experience.
prime_support_description: Join a community of dedicated gamers and tournament enthusiasts. Get help from our support team and participate in exclusive events.
prime_advanced_description: Track your progress with advanced statistics, and enjoy a smoother, more enriched user experience.
